name: Supernatural Bartender
description:
A small game were the premise is to find all the different cocktail creations with the items at your disposal (there are 6* different cocktails) with the items you have around the dungeon. There is no end, so play till you found all 7! We originally had bigger plans, but 3 members dropped out sadly.

*Note: Once upon a time, there were seven planned cocktails for the player to obtain. Unfortunately for players of Dwarf Fortress, Dwarven Wine is unobtainable due to a developer oopsie. The recipe was supposed to be plump helmet juice + wine, but... we forgot to add wine to the game... So plump helments are useless... As are glowberries...

**************************************************************************************

Ingredients are held by enemies or scattered around the dungeon. Defeat the spiders to claim them!

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Spacebar/Left Click - Attack

Tab/I - Inventory

To use appliances, simply walk up to them and click the items you would like to input. The machine will take a bit to process them and produce an output item.

A few tips:

  • Order doesn’t matter with mixtures
  • You don’t need to find common alcohols
  • If an item isn’t found on the ground, you have to kill an enemy to get it!

Psst! If you don't want to perform trial-and-error for all the cocktail recipes, here's a list of all the obtainable drinks. (Aside from goop, which doesn't really count.)

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TNT9QvwavBZrP0OpeAlxDj89eUjIy8_gLP0iwTWwD1Y/...
